title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Racialized Organizations in Racialized Space: How Socio-spatial Divisions Activate Symbolic Boundaries in a Charter School and a Public School
itunes:title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Racialized Organizations in Racialized Space: How Socio-spatial Divisions Activate Symbolic Boundaries in a Charter School and a Public School
description: Author Hajar Yazdiha discusses her article, "Racialized Organizations in Racialized Space: How Socio-spatial Divisions Activate Symbolic Boundaries in a Charter School and a Public School" published in the October 2022 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
